DOC.brief_summary: Randomized trial compare cost effectiveness efficacy kyphoplasty v vertebroplasty treatment painful , osteoporotic vertebral compression fracture .
DOC.brief_title: Cost Effectiveness Efficacy Kyphoplasty Vertebroplasty Trial
DOC.criteria: > = 50 year age Compression fracture ( T4L5 ) within previous 12 mo . Pain compression fracture No malignant tumor No back surgery
